meanings.definition: Animals of unmixed ancestry, especially in reference to horses or dogs.
meanings.sent1: The ranch only raised straightbreds, ensuring their lineage was pure.
meanings.sent2: The dog show featured many straightbreds, showcasing their pure ancestry.
meanings.sent3: The straightbreds at the farm had a family reunion, wagging their tails happily.
meanings.sent4: In the world of show horses, straightbreds were the shining stars of the arena.
meanings.sent5: The straightbreds galloped gracefully, their pure lineage evident in every stride.

meanings.definition: Purebred animals with a documented lineage.
meanings.sent1: The kennel club only accepted straightbreds with proper documentation.
meanings.sent2: The straightbreds at the farm had certificates proving their pure lineage.
meanings.sent3: The straightbreds organized a parade to show off their official papers.
meanings.sent4: Among the farm animals, the straightbreds stood out like royalty with their documented lineage.
meanings.sent5: The straightbreds' pedigree was impeccable, making them highly sought after in the market.

meanings.definition: Animals bred from a specific, pure lineage.
meanings.sent1: The breeder focused on producing straightbreds with a specific lineage.
meanings.sent2: The straightbreds in the competition all came from the same pure lineage.
meanings.sent3: The straightbreds formed a club to celebrate their shared pure lineage.
meanings.sent4: The straightbreds were like a family, connected by their specific, pure lineage.
meanings.sent5: The farm only bred straightbreds, ensuring each animal came from a specific, pure lineage.
